title: 30. The first place to start with natural living- the NO STRESS way
description:
Venturing into natural living and from-scratch cooking can be so overwhelming. I'm sharing a bit about my journey into this lifestyle and the simple place you can begin. 

Paula's bread recipe- https://www.paulasbread.com/recipes.html#paulasbread

Easy sauerkraut- https://www.farmhouseonboone.com/homemadesauerkraut

Milk kefir- https://www.farmhouseonboone.com/how-to-make-milk-kefir

How to cook a roast in the Instant Pot- https://www.farmhouseonboone.com/how-to-cook-a-roast-in-an-instant-pot

How to roast a chicken- https://www.farmhouseonboone.com/how-to-make-a-perfect-roasted-chicken

Grab my Ebook recently updated with ALL of my sourdough recipes HERE!

Get my free 10 day course on how to start a blog HERE.

Follow along with Farmhouse on Boone:

The blog

The Youtube channel

Instagram

5 Steps to an Organized Kitchen Mini Guide

5 Kefir Smoothie Recipes

Farmhouse Favorites Sourdough Recipes

OUR WATER FILTER

Berkey water filter

You can get the review HERE

Join my Facebook group, “Simple Farmhouse Life”

Get my free essential oils class to learn all about the oils we use in the farmhouse! Watch it HERE.

Thanks again for listening and I'll see you in the next episode of the Simple Farmhouse Life podcast!
dc:creator: Lisa Bass
